bill.summary: 3/10/1987--Passed House amended. (Measure passed House, amended) Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain forfeited Federal public lands in Alabama to any qualified trustee who will convey such lands to the current owners of record. Reserves mineral rights to the United States. Prohibits the payment of trustee costs by the United States.
